behavior.name: documentation-structure
behavior.summary: Documentation model defining file layouts and principles for single-project and monorepo setups — where docs live and how they should be organized.

section.name: principles
section.principle: README references INDEX — README is the public face, INDEX is the internal map
INDEX always exists and is complete — every doc file must be linked from INDEX
ARCHITECTURE is always present — even a brief overview of the system design
Think in services and systems — organize docs by what the code does, not by file tree
Not extensive — keep docs concise and scannable, not exhaustive
